attributes.action: rename Michael Aspel, through deed-poll, 'Nuclear Terror Bastard'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Michael Aspel's career, and, indeed, the collective people of great Britian would benefit from the renaming of this great man to 'Nuclear Terror Bastard'

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
